>Construction of pTarget-aspC1
acquire oligo aspC1
acquire oligo pTargRev
acquire plasmid pTargetF
pcr aspC1,pTargRev on pTargetF	(3927 bp, ipcr)
cleanup ipcr	(pcrpdt)
digest pcrpdt with SpeI	(spedig)
cleanup spedig	(dig)
ligate dig	(lig)
transform lig	(Mach1, Spec)

>aspC1
ccataACTAGTacgcgtagctgccgatttccGTTTTAGAGCTAGAAATAGCAAG
>pTargRev
ctcagACTAGTattatacctaggactgagctag
>pTargetF
